name: Island Survival Adventure (ISA)
description:
It`s a Survival/Crafting Game made for the GoedWareGameJam. But created in 4 days. 

Devlog: 

Day 10 Start: Have I collected ideas what kind of game I will make.Day 11 - 12: I got desperate implementing an inventory and crafting system.Day 12: Enemys programmed and created their models and added music and sounds.Day 13: Map createdDay 14: Main menu created, settings and game uploaded.Understanding:Start implementing game basics sooner. Spread the time better and maybe start a smaller project next time. I'm going to catch up on the sleep I've had the last few days.What I would have liked to add. If there was still time:storyMore craft recipesMore enemiesMore oreBigger mapcooperativeMore gunSkills/Skills tree(Maybe in the future)Helpful videos that helped me with the development:Nonetheless, it was a great experience and a lot of fun. (Develops on a person).Have fun playing.Easter Egg: An opponent that should actually come into play but for which there was not enough time.
